scripts.install-all: concurrently --names "root,subscriptions,cinema,client" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,yellow,magenta" "npm install" "npm --prefix backend/subscriptions-server install" "npm --prefix backend/cinema-server install" "npm --prefix client install"
scripts.start-all: concurrently --names "subscriptions,cinema,client" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,magenta" "npm --prefix backend/subscriptions-server run start-dev" "npm --prefix backend/cinema-server run start-dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
